document.full_text: a second day of fighting between thai and cambodian troops on saturday killed at least four soldiers, bringing the two-day death toll to 11, the worst bloodshed since the united nations called for a ceasefire in february.
document.title: fresh fighting on thai-cambodia border kills 4 soldiers
lines_and_colors: a second day of fighting between thai and cambodian troops on saturday killed at least four soldiers, bringing the two-day death toll to 11, the worst bloodshed since the united nations called for a ceasefire in february.
